commit.message:
decl.c (duplicate_decls): Convert use of warning_with_decl() to that of warning().

        * decl.c (duplicate_decls): Convert use of warning_with_decl() to
        that of warning().
        (start_decl): Likewise.
        (start_function): Likewise.

From-SVN: r63625

files.patch:
